00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
00003 
00004 import os
00005 import shutil
00006 
00007 # change the directory below
00008 INSTALL_DIR = r"F:\aquila"
00009 AQUILA_DIR = os.path.dirname(__file__)
00010 
00011 AQUILA_LIB_DIR = os.path.join(AQUILA_DIR, "lib")
00012 INSTALL_LIB_DIR = os.path.join(INSTALL_DIR, "lib")
00013 AQUILA_SRC_DIR = os.path.join(AQUILA_DIR, "src")
00014 INSTALL_SRC_DIR = os.path.join(INSTALL_DIR, r"include\aquila")
00015 AQUILA_DOC_DIR = os.path.join(AQUILA_DIR, "doc")
00016 INSTALL_DOC_DIR = os.path.join(INSTALL_DIR, "doc")
00017 
00018 if os.name == 'posix':
00019     INSTALL_LIB_DIR = "/usr/lib/aquila"
00020     INSTALL_SRC_DIR = "/usr/include/aquila"
00021     INSTALL_DOC_DIR = "/usr/share/doc/aquila"
00022 else:
00023     print "Installing from %s to %s" % (AQUILA_DIR, INSTALL_DIR)
00024 
00025     if os.path.exists(INSTALL_DIR):
00026         print "Looks like it's gonna be an upgrade..."
00027         shutil.rmtree(INSTALL_DIR)
00028         
00029     os.mkdir(INSTALL_DIR)
00030     print "Created install directory"
00031 
00032 print "Copying libraries from %s to %s" % (AQUILA_LIB_DIR, INSTALL_LIB_DIR)
00033 shutil.copytree(AQUILA_LIB_DIR, INSTALL_LIB_DIR)
00034 
00035 print "Copying include files from %s to %s" % (AQUILA_SRC_DIR, INSTALL_SRC_DIR)
00036 shutil.copytree(AQUILA_SRC_DIR, INSTALL_SRC_DIR, ignore=shutil.ignore_patterns(
00037     '.svn*', '*.cpp', '*.rc', '*.pro*', 'Makefile*', 'debug', 'release',
00038     'obj', 'objd', 'object_script.*'))
00039 
00040 print "Copying documentation from %s to %s" % (AQUILA_DOC_DIR, INSTALL_DOC_DIR)
00041 shutil.copytree(AQUILA_DOC_DIR, INSTALL_DOC_DIR)
